name: Pump Crunk
description:
The time for The Micro-Planetary Egg Harvest Festival has begun! Rush around to harvest as much embryonic fluid as you can to fill The Great Crater at The Pole.

Rejoice, young Pump Crunk!

~*****************~

Google Drive link to Windows Download Controls

Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
Target Dash: Spacebar
Menus: Esc

Gamepad also works (kinda) we didn't get the menus wired up on gamepad in time :'( . You'll have to use keyboard/mouse when menus are presented.

~*****************~
